maqras.text: 72|1|Baluna [1], ‘amara prati ohi nayila hayeche ye, jinadera [2] ekati dala manoyogera sathe suneche [3] atahpara baleche, ‘amara to eka bismayakara kura'ana sunechi [4]
72|2|ya satyera dike hedayata kare; phale amara ete imana enechi. Ara amara kakhano amadera rabera sathe ka'uke sarika karaba na
72|3|ara niscaya'i amadera rabera maryada samucca [1]; tini grahana karenani kono sangini ebam na kona santana.
72|4|E'o ye, amadera madhyakara nirbodhera allah sambandhe khuba'i abantara ukti karata [1].
72|5|Athaca amara mane karatama manusa ebam jina allah samparke kakhano mithya balabe na.
72|6|E'o ye, kichu kichu manusa kichu jinera asraya nita, phale tara jinadera atmambharita bariye diyechila [1].’
72|7|‘E'o ye, tara dharana karechila yemana tomara dharana kara [1] ye, allah ka'uke'o kakhano punaruthita karabena na [2].’
72|8|‘E'o ye, amara ceyechilama akasera tathya sangraha karate kintu amara dekhate pelama kathora prahari o ulkapinda dbara akasa paripurna

72|9|‘e'o ye, amara age akasera bibhinna ghamtite sambada sunara jan'ya basatama [1]; kintu ekhana ke'u sambada sunate ca'ile se tara upara niksepera jan'ya prastuta jalanta ulkapindera sam'mukhina haya.
72|10|‘E'o ye, amara jani na yaminera adhibasidera amangala'i abhipraeta, na tadera raba tadera mangala cana [1].
72|11|‘E'o ye, amadera kichu sankhyaka satkarmaparayana ebam kichu sankhyaka era byatikrama, amara chilama bibhinna pathera anusari [1]
72|12|e'o ye, amara bujhechi, amara yamine allahke parabhuta karate paraba na ebam paliye'o tamke byartha karate paraba na.
72|13|E'o ye, amara yakhana hidayatera bani sunalama tate imana analama. Sutaram ye byakti tara rabera prati imana ane tara kono ksati o kono an'yayera asanka thakabe na [1].’
72|14|‘E'o ye, amadera madhye kichu sankhyaka ache musalima ara kichu sankhyaka ache simalanghanakari; atahpara yara isalama grahana kareche tara sucintitabhabe satya patha beche niyeche.
72|15|‘Ara yara simalanghanakari tara to hayeche jahannamera indhana.’
72|16|Ara tara yadi satya pathe pratisthita thakata tabe abasya'i taderake amara pracura bari barsane sikta karatama
72|17|Ya dbara amara taderake pariksa karate pari. Ara ye byakti tara rabera smarana hate bimukha haya tini take duhsaha sastite prabesa karabena.
72|18|Ara niscaya masajidasamuha allahara'i jan'ya. Kaje'i allahra sathe tomara an'ya ka'uke deko na [1].
72|19|Ara niscaya yakhana allahara banda [1] tamke dakara jan'ya damrala, takhana tara tara kache bhira jamala.
72|20|Baluna, ‘ami to kebala amara rabake'i daki ebam tamra sange ka'uke'o sarika kari na.’
72|21|Baluna, ‘niscaya ami tomadera kono ksati ba kalyanera malika na'i’
72|22|baluna, ‘allahra pakara'o hate ke'u'i amake raksa karate parabe na ebam allah chara ami kakhana'o kono asraya paba na [1]

72|23|‘sudhu allahara paksa theke paumchano ebam tamra risalatera bani pracara'i amara dayitba. Ara ye-ke'u allah o tamra rasulake aman'ya kare tara jan'ya rayeche jahannamera aguna, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe [1].’
72|24|Abasese yakhana tara ya pratisruta ta pratyaksa karabe, takhana tara janate parabe ke sahayyakari hisebe adhikatara durbala ebam sankhyaya sbalpa.
72|25|Baluna, ‘ami jani na tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta ki asanna, na amara rabera jan'ya kono dirgha meyada sthira karabena.’
72|26|Tini'i gayebi bisayera jnani, tini tamra gayebera jnana kara'o kache prakasa karena na [1]
72|27|tamra manonita rasula chara. Se ksetre allah tamra rasulera samane ebam pichane prahari niyojita karena [1]

72|28|yate tini prakasa karena ye, abasya'i tara tadera rabera risalata pauche diyechena [1]. Ara tadera kache ya ache ta tini jnane paribestana kare rekhechena ebam tini pratiti bastu ganana kare hiseba rekhechena [2].
73|1|He bastraabrta
73|2|rate salate damrana [1], kichu ansa chara
73|3|adha-rata ba tara ceye'o kichu kama.
73|4|Athaba tara ceye'o ekatu barana. Ara kura'ana tila'oyata karuna dhire dhire suspastabhabe [1]
73|5|niscaya amara apanara prati nayila karachi gurubhara bani [1].
73|6|Niscaya ratera belara utha [1] prabrtti dalane prabalatara [2] ebam bakasphurane adhika upayogi [3].
73|7|Niscaya dinera belaya apanara jan'ya rayeche dirgha karmabyastata [1].
73|8|Ara apani apanara rabera nama smarana karuna ebam tamra prati magna hona ekanisthabhabe [1].
73|9|Tini purba o pascimera raba, tini chara kono satya ilah ne'i. Ata'eba, takemi apani grahana karuna karmabidhayakarupe.
73|10|Ara loke ya bale, tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam saujan'yera sathe taderake parihara kare caluna [1].
73|11|Ara chere dina amake o bilasa samagrira adhikari mithyaropakariderake [1] ebam kichu kalera jan'ya taderake abakasa dina
73|12|niscaya amadera kache ache srnkhalasamuha o prajbalita aguna
73|13|ara ache emana khadya ya galaya atake yaya ebam yantranadayaka sasti [1].
73|14|Sedina yamina o parbatamala prakampita habe ebam parbatasamuha biksipta bahamana balukarasite parinata habe [1].
73|15|Niscaya amara tomadera kache pathiyechi eka rasula tomadera jan'ya saksisbarupa yemana rasula pathiyechilama phira‘a'unera kache
73|16|kintu phira‘a'una se rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale amara take atyanta saktabhabe pakara'o karechilama.
73|17|Ata'eba, yadi tomara kuphari kara, tabe ki kare antaraksa karabe sedina ye dinati kisoraderake parinata karabe brd'dhe
73|18|sedina asamana habe bidirna [1]. Tamra pratisruti abasya'i bastabayita habe.
73|19|Niscaya eta eka upadesa, ata'eba ye caya se tara rabera dike patha abalambana karuka
